div.style: .card.cardtimeentry { padding: 0px; border-radius: 6px; overflow: hidden; margin-bottom: 15px; border-top: 5px solid #ccc } .card.cardtimeentry[cssselectorhelper="Approved"] { border-top: 5px solid #6fd162 } .card.cardtimeentry[cssselectorhelper="Declined"] { border-top: 5px solid #FF5D5D } .card.cardtimeentry .btn { height: 37px; font-size: 1rem } .card.cardtimeentry .badge { margin: 3px 0 }
